original_text: Then he placed the peeled branches in all the watering troughs, so that they would be directly in front of the flocks when they came to drink. When the flocks were in heat and came to drink,
korean_text: 그 껍질 벗긴 가지를 양 떼가 와서 먹는 개천의 물 구유에 세워 양 떼를 향하게 하매 그 떼가 물을 먹으러 올 때에 새끼를 배니

sentences.original_text: Then he placed the peeled branches
so that they would be directly in front of the flocks
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들이 양 떼 바로 앞에 있게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: When the flocks were in heat
